headline: Wells Fargo Cuts PT on Sarepta Therapeutics (SRPT) to $38 From $45
summary: Sarepta Therapeutics, Inc. (NASDAQ:SRPT) is one of the best cheap biotech stocks to buy now. On February 27, Wells Fargo cut the price target on Sarepta Therapeutics, Inc. (NASDAQ:SRPT) to $38 from $45 while maintaining an Overweight rating on the shares. The firm stated that, given 2026 guidance, it appears that the GTx launch reset […]
